sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import AvatarContext from './AvatarContext' import './Contact.css'; function Contact({ person }) { const {setCurrentContact } = useContext(AvatarContext); return (
(setCurrentContact(person))} className="mb-3 row p-2 text-light user-card bg-dark" id={person.user.id} style={{cursor:"pointer"}}>

{person.name}

  • City: {person.ville}
  • Phone: {person.tel}
) } export default Contact
